evidence.claim: Prestige Systems utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA standards in its healthcare technology solutions.
Integration patterns include EDI transactions that support X12 standards.
The company adopts FHIR for interoperable health data exchange.
They also implement Azure for their healthcare data management solutions.
HL7 standards are adhered to in their software architecture.

icp.icp_reason: Limited public information on X12 transactions or API automation use cases.
